thread.title: Make John Joseph's Ridiculously Delicious Vegan Lasagna
thread.title_full: Make John Joseph's Ridiculously Delicious Vegan Lasagna

author: Munchies Staff
title: Make John Joseph's Ridiculously Delicious Vegan Lasagna
text:
Make John Joseph's Ridiculously Delicious Vegan Lasagna Vegan or not, we promise that this is some of the best lasagna you've ever tasted. 
OK, we know that for some meat- and cheese-obsessed people (and we know quite a few of those), the word "vegan" can stoke skepticism when it comes as a preface to certain dishes. But no matter how many times you've been burned by the sunflower-seed burger at that cafe that your juice-chugging friend from LA always wants to hit up when they're in town, trust us when we tell you that this is no ordinary vegan lasagna. 
You won't find cardboardy, gluten-free noodles in this dish, nor a bland, unseasoned tomato sauce that claims to be "clean," or, godforbid some spirulina dust or dehydrated cashew butter crackers. 
This vegan lasagna recipe from author and Cro Mags frontman John Joseph is for people who love lasagna in all forms, and it's totally loaded with a super-flavorful homemade sauce, tons of cheese (vegan mozzarella and ricottaâ€”store-bought for your convenience), meatless ground beef, and yep, a bunch of veggies snuck in there for good measure.
